thread.title: Is arresting drug users the wrong cure for low-level crime? PBS NewsHour
thread.title_full: Video: Is arresting drug users the wrong cure for low-level crime? | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Is arresting drug users the wrong cure for low-level crime? PBS NewsHour
text: More than 130 law enforcement officials from around the country have gathered in Washington to push for reform. Chicago Police Department Superintendent Garry McCarthy and Benjamin David, district attorney from New Hanover and Pender Counties in North Carolina, talk with Judy Woodruff about whether there are better strategies for dealing with non-violent offenders.
